findings.liver: Normal signal and morphology on T2 weighted imaging; signal drop-off on out of phase imaging compatible with fatty deposition; no focal lesions identified.
findings.lesion: 0.7 cm enhancing lesion within the caudate lobe likely representing focal nodular hyperplasia.
findings.gallbladder: Multiple gallstones; 1.3 cm gallstone within gallbladder neck; gallbladder slightly distended with a small amount of pericholecystic fluid; tiny 4 mm focal nodule within gallbladder wall consistent with a polyp.
findings.other: Normal findings in pancreas, spleen, kidneys; no upper abdominal or retroperitoneal lymphadenopathy; trace of free fluid adjacent to liver; trace right pleural effusion.
